Project Manager Job at Recruit with Adenike




        
    

        
        Recruit with Adenike is a recruitment and talent solutions brand committed to connecting high-performing professionals with forward-thinking organizations across diverse industries. From entry-level roles to executive placements, we help businesses attract, engage, and retain the right talent to fuel growth and success. Our approach is efficient, personalized, and rooted in a deep understanding of people and business needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager
Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Oil and Gas

About the Role
     

            
    




	As a Project Manager, you’ll lead multidisciplinary teams to deliver projects on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. You'll ensure safety compliance, manage client relationships, and drive continuous improvement across all phases of project delivery.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead end-to-end project execution with focus on timelines, budget, and quality.
	Develop and manage project plans, budgets, and schedules.
	Coordinate engineers, technicians, and contractors for seamless delivery.
	Ensure strict compliance with safety protocols and industry regulations.
	Build and maintain strong client relationships.
	Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks.
	Monitor project costs and financial performance.
	Collaborate with business development teams to explore new opportunities.
	Evaluate project outcomes and implement improvements.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or related field (minimum 2:1).
	Minimum 10 years of relevant experience, with proven success in project delivery.
	Strong knowledge of project management methodologies (PMBOK, Agile, etc.).
	Excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skills.
	Ability to manage multiple projects in a dynamic environment.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, PowerPoint, etc.).
	Extensive experience in the oil and gas industry.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Master’s degree in a relevant field.
	PMP, PRINCE2, or equivalent certification.
	Experience with project management tools (MS Project, Asana, etc.).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send send ther CV to: recruitmentforce.africa@gmail.com using “Project Manager – Oil & Gas” as the subject of the mail.

  "description": "Hugo is a Future-of-Work company. We build and manage remote teams in black communities for some of the world&rsquo;s largest technology and media companies. We specialize in end-to-end machine learning data annotation and omnichannel support solutions that ultimately yield more inclusive outcomes for both black communities globally and our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager, IT Service Management and Performance

Manager, IT Service Management and Performance Job at Hugo Technologies




        
    

        
        Hugo is a Future-of-Work company. We build and manage remote teams in black communities for some of the world’s largest technology and media companies. We specialize in end-to-end machine learning data annotation and omnichannel support solutions that ultimately yield more inclusive outcomes for both black communities globally and our clients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager, IT Service Management and Performance

Job Location: Nigeria
Department: IT Operations

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Monitor and evaluate IT service performance against established Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), and reporting same to the business.
	Drive root-cause analysis and ensure prompt resolution of incidents and problems, reducing service downtime and improving user experience.
	Oversee the evaluation, selection, implementation and/or optimization of Hugo’s ITSM technology platform to improve process orchestration, automation, reporting, and service/approval workflows.
	Collaborate with IT teams and business stakeholders to ensure ITSM platform meets the evolving needs of the business and clients.
	Ensure accurate documentation of IT service assets and configuration items (CIs) in the Configuration Management Database (CMDB).
	Collaborate with vendors to ensure third-party services meet internal and client requirements, focusing on service quality and compliance.
	Drive key suppliers’ periodic performance review meetings to ensure benefit/value realization in line with agreed SLAs.
	Ensure IT service management practices comply with relevant regulatory frameworks and certifications, including PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, HITRUST and other data protection standards (e.g., GDPR, NDPR).
	Oversee and enforce service management policies, procedures, and standards across the IT function.


Must-Have Qualifications/Experience


	Experience in a business process outsourcing (BPO) organization is highly desirable.
	Effective communication and interpersonal skills to work with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
	Understanding of compliance requirements, including PCI-DSS, ISO 27001, GDPR, and NDPR.
	ITIL v4 Certification (Foundation or higher); COBIT, PMP, or Six Sigma certification is a plus.


Preferred Background:


	Minimum 7 years of experience in IT service management or a related role, with at least 3 years in a senior capacity.
	Proven experience in improving ITSM maturity and delivering measurable service improvements.
	Strong knowledge of ITSM tools such as ServiceNow, Fresh Service, SysAid, SolarWinds etc.


What We Provide


	Hugo offers a hybrid work environment that balances employee flexibility with a collegial, fun office culture.
	We pride ourselves on offering a dynamic environment where ambitious professionals can make a measurable impact and accelerate their career.
	Our compensation and benefits are highly competitive.

title: Job Openings at the Party Rentals Station
content:
The Party Rentals Station (TPRS) is Stylish Event Rental Company offering the most unique line of luxury décor items and event solutions. Our Collection includes a variety of the finest and carefully selected luxury chairs, VVIP Tables,Mobile Tents, Mist fans/Air Coolers, Cocktail tables, bar stools, Upholstered Lounge sofas,Event lighting, Special effects, Tableware, and lots more.

Whether you are a Wedding Planner, Event Manager, Event Designer, Photographer, Industry Vendor, or Do-It-Yourselfer, Our In-House Team of Creative Event Professionals are available to offer you everything you need from our line of exclusive products designed to make your Event as special as possible.
     

            
    



At the Party Rental Station, we pride ourselves in offering exceptional customer service as well as excellent service delivery. Our team is here to help ensure that your rental process is seamless and easy.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Facility Officer (Construction or Engineering Background)

Job Location: Apapa-Oshodi Expressway, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Resumption: Immediate
Work days: Monday (8am-6pm) - Saturday (11am-4pm)

Responsibilities


	Oversee the day-to-day smooth management and operation of the office buildings and accommodation infrastructure through administrative support as well as overseeing the general maintenance of tasks.
	Maintain all facilities and equipment within the system and their related issues including record keeping, repairs and supervision of personnel working within the facility premises.
	Responsible for the monthly payment for utilities such as energy used, waste disposal and cable subscription.
	Any other assigned tasks.


Requirements


	B.Eng / HND in Facility Management, Civil Engineering or Building Engineering or any other relevant discipline.
	2 - 5 years of similar experience with Construction or Engineering background.
	Professional certification in Engineering or Facility Management is an added advantage.


Competencies Required:


	Good knowledge of facilities and space administration
	Good interpersonal, communication and customer service skills.
	Excellent organisational skills.
	Good team player.
	Attention to detail.


Salary
N150,000 Net Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 4th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hrtprs7@gmail.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the mail.

 

2.) Warehouse Manager

Job Location: Apapa-Oshodi Expressway, Lagos
Resumption: Immediate
Employment Type: Full Time

Responsibilities


	Supervising warehouse staff and daily activities.
	Managing, evaluating and reporting on warehouse productivity.
	Tracking and coordinating the receipt, storage, and timely delivery of goods and materials.
	Maintaining records, reporting relevant information and preparing any necessary documentation.
	Ensuring basic maintenance standards and compliance with health and safety regulations.
	Performing a daily inspection of the warehouse.
	Coordinating and maintaining warehouse fleets and equipment.
	Communicating and coordinating with other departments and customers.


Requirements


	Minimum of B.Sc/HND or its equivalent.
	5-years of experience as a Warehouse Manager.
	Strong working knowledge of warehouse operations and management.
	Time management skills and the ability to delegate.
	Excellent leadership and organizational skills.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and data entry software.
	Problem-solving skills, grit and enthusiastic.


Salary
N240,000 Monthly. 

Application Closing Date: 4th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: hrtprs7@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Project Analyst Specialist

Job Location: Nigeria

Job Summary


	The Project Analyst Specialist provides advanced analytical support to the project management team by collecting and interpreting complex data, identifying trends, monitoring performance, and contributing to strategic decision-making.
	This role ensures project objectives are met efficiently by proactively tracking progress, risks, and deliverables, and by driving process improvements across all project phases.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Project Management, Business Administration, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of relevant experience in a project support or analyst role, preferably in oil & gas or engineering services.
	Proficient in project management tools and software (e.g., MS Project, Primavera P6, Excel, Power BI).
	Strong knowledge of project lifecycle and performance metrics.
	Understanding of project controls, budgeting, scheduling, and reporting standards.


Application Closing Date: 22th August, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send a copy of their resume to: recruitment@seflamsgl.com and stakeholder.recruitment@ncdmb.gov.ng using the Job Position as subject of the mail.
